CMD Digital Playground

This progressive web app allows non-tech-y textwriters, developers, students and other collaborators to contribute to an environment that contains (in-depth) information about Communication and Multimedia Design, reflects CMD's view on Digital Interactive Design and displays their other activities or initiatives such as Battery or Golden Dot Awards. Final assignment of the minor Web Development 2020.

Description

A new, statically generated website that functions as a fundament for a new site for Communication & Multimedia Design at the Amsterdam University of Applied Sciences. Using Headless CMS Storyblok, students and teachers can create custom components and pages. Along with this, a handbook for onboarding new collaborators which explains how this new CMS and website works.

PWA team project, data managed by a headless CMS. Allows non-tech-y text-writers, developers, students and other collaborators to contribute to this environment that contains (in-depth) information about Communication and Multimedia Design.

The final assignment of the minor Web Development, built by a 3-man team. This was my first time using Eleventy in a project, and working with a Headless CMS. Data is pulled from the CMS and put into a logical structure of cleaning, assigning and rendering, and then rolled out as a static site. It was mostly an assignment about making a proof of concept for integration with a headless CMS. It's super interesting and the features of the CMS are still evolving, and ever since I've been wanting to work more with it. Therefore this portfolio's project content is also linked with Storyblok :)
